title: AdTech 05674 Permanent Crafter's Tape Refills, single unit
description: AdTech Crafter's Tape Refill contains 8 AdTech Crafter’s Adhesive Tape rolls. Each roll is . 31” wide X 8. 75 yds/8mm X 8m Long. AdTech’s strong double sided tape works on virtually all materials including paper, card stock, plastic, small pieces of wood, foam board, glitter board, vellum, and more. It’s acid-free, permanent, non-toxic, and photo safe to keep your photos and crafts in excellent shape over time. AdTech Crafter's Tape Refill is ideal for scrapbooking, crafting, giftwrapping, and more. From the Manufacturer: A US family owned and operated company. AdTech Crafter's Tape is easy to use. Just apply even pressure and pull AdTech Crafter’s Tape towards you on any clean, dry surface for a no-mess, strong double sided tape bond. It’s permanent, acid-free, non-toxic, and photo safe, allowing you to safely mount your photos and projects. Need a refill? No problem. Just open the case, remove the empty cartridge, and replace with a fresh roll of AdTech Crafter's Tape! AdTech Crafter's Tape is a must for any crafter – perfect for scrapbooking, gift wrapping, and other projects. Works on virtually all materials including paper, cardstock, plastic, small pieces of wood, foam board, glitter board, vellum, crepe, construction paper, and more.
